cvDescription.description: I am a highly motivated person who can quickly adjust to new challenging situations and unexpected difficulties. My qualities such as ability to absorb advanced technical manuals and to learn new technologies were developed thanks to my studies at the Brest State Technical University. I am a reserved and detail-focused person which allows me to be successful at managing my responsibilities. My liability and leadership skills help me and my team to evolve, whereas my sociability allows me to communicate with clients properly and to reach mutual understanding and comfortable cooperation.
